00005 MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::MultiBodyImpl(int num_bodies_, int num_dofs_)
00006         : m_num_bodies(num_bodies_), m_num_dofs(num_dofs_)
00007 #if (defined BT_ID_HAVE_MAT3X) && (defined BT_ID_WITH_JACOBIANS)
00008         ,m_m3x(3,m_num_dofs)
00009 #endif
00010 {
00011 
00012 #if (defined BT_ID_HAVE_MAT3X) && (defined BT_ID_WITH_JACOBIANS)
00013         resize(m_m3x,m_num_dofs);
00014 #endif
00015         m_body_list.resize(num_bodies_);
00016         m_parent_index.resize(num_bodies_);
00017         m_child_indices.resize(num_bodies_);
00018         m_user_int.resize(num_bodies_);
00019         m_user_ptr.resize(num_bodies_);
00020 
00021         m_world_gravity(0) = 0.0;
00022         m_world_gravity(1) = 0.0;
00023         m_world_gravity(2) = -9.8;
00024 }

00026 const char *MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::jointTypeToString(const JointType &type) const {
00027         switch (type) {
00028                 case FIXED:
00029                         return "fixed";
00030                 case REVOLUTE:
00031                         return "revolute";
00032                 case PRISMATIC:
00033                         return "prismatic";
00034                 case FLOATING:
00035                         return "floating";
00036         }
00037         return "error: invalid";
00038 }

00040 inline void indent(const int &level) {
00041         for (int j = 0; j < level; j++)
00042                 id_printf("  ");  // indent
00043 }

00045 void MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::printTree() {
00046         id_printf("body %.2d[%s]: root\n", 0, jointTypeToString(m_body_list[0].m_joint_type));
00047         printTree(0, 0);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::printTreeData() {
00051         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_list.size(); i++) {
00052                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[i];
00053                 id_printf("body: %d\n", static_cast<int>(i));
00054                 id_printf("type: %s\n", jointTypeToString(body.m_joint_type));
00055                 id_printf("q_index= %d\n", body.m_q_index);
00056                 id_printf("Jac_JR= [%f;%f;%f]\n", body.m_Jac_JR(0), body.m_Jac_JR(1), body.m_Jac_JR(2));
00057                 id_printf("Jac_JT= [%f;%f;%f]\n", body.m_Jac_JT(0), body.m_Jac_JT(1), body.m_Jac_JT(2));
00058 
00059                 id_printf("mass = %f\n", body.m_mass);
00060                 id_printf("mass * com = [%f %f %f]\n", body.m_body_mass_com(0), body.m_body_mass_com(1),
00061                                   body.m_body_mass_com(2));
00062                 id_printf("I_o= [%f %f %f;\n"
00063                                   "       %f %f %f;\n"
00064                                   "       %f %f %f]\n",
00065                                   body.m_body_I_body(0, 0), body.m_body_I_body(0, 1), body.m_body_I_body(0, 2),
00066                                   body.m_body_I_body(1, 0), body.m_body_I_body(1, 1), body.m_body_I_body(1, 2),
00067                                   body.m_body_I_body(2, 0), body.m_body_I_body(2, 1), body.m_body_I_body(2, 2));
00068 
00069                 id_printf("parent_pos_parent_body_ref= [%f %f %f]\n", body.m_parent_pos_parent_body_ref(0),
00070                                   body.m_parent_pos_parent_body_ref(1), body.m_parent_pos_parent_body_ref(2));
00071         }
00072 }
00073 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::bodyNumDoFs(const JointType &type) const {
00074         switch (type) {
00075                 case FIXED:
00076                         return 0;
00077                 case REVOLUTE:
00078                 case PRISMATIC:
00079                         return 1;
00080                 case FLOATING:
00081                         return 6;
00082         }
00083         error_message("unknown joint type %d\n", type);
00084         return 0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::printTree(int index, int indentation) {
00088         // this is adapted from URDF2Bullet.
00089         // TODO: fix this and print proper graph (similar to git --log --graph)
00090         int num_children = m_child_indices[index].size();
00091 
00092         indentation += 2;
00093         int count = 0;
00094 
00095         for (int i = 0; i < num_children; i++) {
00096                 int child_index = m_child_indices[index][i];
00097                 indent(indentation);
00098                 id_printf("body %.2d[%s]: %.2d is child no. %d (qi= %d .. %d) \n", index,
00099                                   jointTypeToString(m_body_list[index].m_joint_type), child_index, (count++) + 1,
00100                                   m_body_list[index].m_q_index,
00101                                   m_body_list[index].m_q_index + bodyNumDoFs(m_body_list[index].m_joint_type));
00102                 // first grandchild
00103                 printTree(child_index, indentation);
00104         }
00105 }

00107 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::setGravityInWorldFrame(const vec3 &gravity) {
00108         m_world_gravity = gravity;
00109         return 0;

00111 
00112 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::generateIndexSets() {
00113         m_body_revolute_list.resize(0);
00114         m_body_prismatic_list.resize(0);
00115         int q_index = 0;
00116         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_list.size(); i++) {
00117                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[i];
00118                 body.m_q_index = -1;
00119                 switch (body.m_joint_type) {
00120                         case REVOLUTE:
00121                                 m_body_revolute_list.push_back(i);
00122                                 body.m_q_index = q_index;
00123                                 q_index++;
00124                                 break;
00125                         case PRISMATIC:
00126                                 m_body_prismatic_list.push_back(i);
00127                                 body.m_q_index = q_index;
00128                                 q_index++;
00129                                 break;
00130                         case FIXED:
00131                                 // do nothing
00132                                 break;
00133                         case FLOATING:
00134                                 m_body_floating_list.push_back(i);
00135                                 body.m_q_index = q_index;
00136                                 q_index += 6;
00137                                 break;
00138                         default:
00139                                 error_message("unsupported joint type %d\n", body.m_joint_type);
00140                                 return -1;
00141                 }
00142         }
00143         // sanity check
00144         if (q_index != m_num_dofs) {
00145                 error_message("internal error, q_index= %d but num_dofs %d\n", q_index, m_num_dofs);
00146                 return -1;
00147         }
00148 
00149         m_child_indices.resize(m_body_list.size());
00150 
00151         for (idArrayIdx child = 1; child < m_parent_index.size(); child++) {
00152                 const int &parent = m_parent_index[child];
00153                 if (parent >= 0 && parent < (static_cast<int>(m_parent_index.size()) - 1)) {
00154                         m_child_indices[parent].push_back(child);
00155                 } else {
00156                         if (-1 == parent) {
00157                                 // multiple bodies are directly linked to the environment, ie, not a single root
00158                                 error_message("building index sets parent(%zu)= -1 (multiple roots)\n", child);
00159                         } else {
00160                                 // should never happen
00161                                 error_message(
00162                                         "building index sets. parent_index[%zu]= %d, but m_parent_index.size()= %d\n",
00163                                         child, parent, static_cast<int>(m_parent_index.size()));
00164                         }
00165                         return -1;
00166                 }
00167         }
00168 
00169         return 0;
00170 }
00171 
00172 void MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::calculateStaticData() {
00173         // relative kinematics that are not a function of q, u, dot_u
00174         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_list.size(); i++) {
00175                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[i];
00176                 switch (body.m_joint_type) {
00177                         case REVOLUTE:
00178                                 body.m_parent_vel_rel(0) = 0;
00179                                 body.m_parent_vel_rel(1) = 0;
00180                                 body.m_parent_vel_rel(2) = 0;
00181                                 body.m_parent_acc_rel(0) = 0;
00182                                 body.m_parent_acc_rel(1) = 0;
00183                                 body.m_parent_acc_rel(2) = 0;
00184                                 body.m_parent_pos_parent_body = body.m_parent_pos_parent_body_ref;
00185                                 break;
00186                         case PRISMATIC:
00187                                 body.m_body_T_parent = body.m_body_T_parent_ref;
00188                                 body.m_parent_Jac_JT = body.m_body_T_parent_ref.transpose() * body.m_Jac_JT;
00189                                 body.m_body_ang_vel_rel(0) = 0;
00190                                 body.m_body_ang_vel_rel(1) = 0;
00191                                 body.m_body_ang_vel_rel(2) = 0;
00192                                 body.m_body_ang_acc_rel(0) = 0;
00193                                 body.m_body_ang_acc_rel(1) = 0;
00194                                 body.m_body_ang_acc_rel(2) = 0;
00195                                 break;
00196                         case FIXED:
00197                                 body.m_parent_pos_parent_body = body.m_parent_pos_parent_body_ref;
00198                                 body.m_body_T_parent = body.m_body_T_parent_ref;
00199                                 body.m_body_ang_vel_rel(0) = 0;
00200                                 body.m_body_ang_vel_rel(1) = 0;
00201                                 body.m_body_ang_vel_rel(2) = 0;
00202                                 body.m_parent_vel_rel(0) = 0;
00203                                 body.m_parent_vel_rel(1) = 0;
00204                                 body.m_parent_vel_rel(2) = 0;
00205                                 body.m_body_ang_acc_rel(0) = 0;
00206                                 body.m_body_ang_acc_rel(1) = 0;
00207                                 body.m_body_ang_acc_rel(2) = 0;
00208                                 body.m_parent_acc_rel(0) = 0;
00209                                 body.m_parent_acc_rel(1) = 0;
00210                                 body.m_parent_acc_rel(2) = 0;
00211                                 break;
00212                         case FLOATING:
00213                                 // no static data
00214                                 break;
00215                 }
00216 
00217        // resize & initialize jacobians to zero.
00218 #if (defined BT_ID_HAVE_MAT3X) && (defined BT_ID_WITH_JACOBIANS)
00219         body.m_body_dot_Jac_T_u(0) = 0.0;
00220         body.m_body_dot_Jac_T_u(1) = 0.0;
00221         body.m_body_dot_Jac_T_u(2) = 0.0;
00222         body.m_body_dot_Jac_R_u(0) = 0.0;
00223         body.m_body_dot_Jac_R_u(1) = 0.0;
00224         body.m_body_dot_Jac_R_u(2) = 0.0;
00225         resize(body.m_body_Jac_T,m_num_dofs);
00226         resize(body.m_body_Jac_R,m_num_dofs);
00227         body.m_body_Jac_T.setZero();
00228         body.m_body_Jac_R.setZero();
00229 #endif //
00230         }
00231 }
00232 
00233 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::calculateInverseDynamics(const vecx &q, const vecx &u,
00234                                                                                                                    const vecx &dot_u, vecx *joint_forces) {
00235         if (q.size() != m_num_dofs || u.size() != m_num_dofs || dot_u.size() != m_num_dofs ||
00236                 joint_forces->size() != m_num_dofs) {
00237                 error_message("wrong vector dimension. system has %d DOFs,\n"
00238                                           "but dim(q)= %d, dim(u)= %d, dim(dot_u)= %d, dim(joint_forces)= %d\n",
00239                                           m_num_dofs, static_cast<int>(q.size()), static_cast<int>(u.size()),
00240                                           static_cast<int>(dot_u.size()), static_cast<int>(joint_forces->size()));
00241                 return -1;
00242         }
00243         // 1. relative kinematics
00244         if(-1 == calculateKinematics(q,u,dot_u, POSITION_VELOCITY_ACCELERATION)) {
00245             error_message("error in calculateKinematics\n");
00246             return -1;
00247         }
00248         // 2. update contributions to equations of motion for every body.
00249         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_list.size(); i++) {
00250                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[i];
00251                 // 3.4 update dynamic terms (rate of change of angular & linear momentum)
00252                 body.m_eom_lhs_rotational =
00253                         body.m_body_I_body * body.m_body_ang_acc + body.m_body_mass_com.cross(body.m_body_acc) +
00254                         body.m_body_ang_vel.cross(body.m_body_I_body * body.m_body_ang_vel) -
00255                         body.m_body_moment_user;
00256                 body.m_eom_lhs_translational =
00257                         body.m_body_ang_acc.cross(body.m_body_mass_com) + body.m_mass * body.m_body_acc +
00258                         body.m_body_ang_vel.cross(body.m_body_ang_vel.cross(body.m_body_mass_com)) -
00259                         body.m_body_force_user;
00260         }
00261 
00262         // 3. calculate full set of forces at parent joint
00263         // (not directly calculating the joint force along the free direction
00264         // simplifies inclusion of fixed joints.
00265         // An alternative would be to fuse bodies in a pre-processing step,
00266         // but that would make changing masses online harder (eg, payload masses
00267         // added with fixed  joints to a gripper)
00268         // Also, this enables adding zero weight bodies as a way to calculate frame poses
00269         // for force elements, etc.
00270 
00271         for (int body_idx = m_body_list.size() - 1; body_idx >= 0; body_idx--) {
00272                 // sum of forces and moments acting on this body from its children
00273                 vec3 sum_f_children;
00274                 vec3 sum_m_children;
00275                 setZero(sum_f_children);
00276                 setZero(sum_m_children);
00277                 for (idArrayIdx child_list_idx = 0; child_list_idx < m_child_indices[body_idx].size();
00278                          child_list_idx++) {
00279                         const RigidBody &child = m_body_list[m_child_indices[body_idx][child_list_idx]];
00280                         vec3 child_joint_force_in_this_frame =
00281                                 child.m_body_T_parent.transpose() * child.m_force_at_joint;
00282                         sum_f_children -= child_joint_force_in_this_frame;
00283                         sum_m_children -= child.m_body_T_parent.transpose() * child.m_moment_at_joint +
00284                                                           child.m_parent_pos_parent_body.cross(child_joint_force_in_this_frame);
00285                 }
00286                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_idx];
00287 
00288                 body.m_force_at_joint = body.m_eom_lhs_translational - sum_f_children;
00289                 body.m_moment_at_joint = body.m_eom_lhs_rotational - sum_m_children;
00290         }
00291 
00292         // 4. Calculate Joint forces.
00293         // These are the components of force_at_joint/moment_at_joint
00294         // in the free directions given by Jac_JT/Jac_JR
00295         // 4.1 revolute joints
00296         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_revolute_list.size(); i++) {
00297                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[m_body_revolute_list[i]];
00298                 // (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index) = body.m_Jac_JR.transpose() * body.m_moment_at_joint;
00299                 (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index) = body.m_Jac_JR.dot(body.m_moment_at_joint);
00300         }
00301         // 4.2 for prismatic joints
00302         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_prismatic_list.size(); i++) {
00303                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[m_body_prismatic_list[i]];
00304                 // (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index) = body.m_Jac_JT.transpose() * body.m_force_at_joint;
00305                 (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index) = body.m_Jac_JT.dot(body.m_force_at_joint);
00306         }
00307         // 4.3 floating bodies (6-DoF joints)
00308         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_floating_list.size(); i++) {
00309                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[m_body_floating_list[i]];
00310                 (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index + 0) = body.m_moment_at_joint(0);
00311                 (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index + 1) = body.m_moment_at_joint(1);
00312                 (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index + 2) = body.m_moment_at_joint(2);
00313 
00314                 (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index + 3) = body.m_force_at_joint(0);
00315                 (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index + 4) = body.m_force_at_joint(1);
00316                 (*joint_forces)(body.m_q_index + 5) = body.m_force_at_joint(2);
00317         }
00318 
00319         return 0;
00320 }
00321 
00322 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::calculateKinematics(const vecx &q, const vecx &u, const vecx& dot_u,
00323                                                       const KinUpdateType type) {
00324         if (q.size() != m_num_dofs || u.size() != m_num_dofs || dot_u.size() != m_num_dofs ) {
00325                 error_message("wrong vector dimension. system has %d DOFs,\n"
00326                                           "but dim(q)= %d, dim(u)= %d, dim(dot_u)= %d\n",
00327                                           m_num_dofs, static_cast<int>(q.size()), static_cast<int>(u.size()),
00328                                           static_cast<int>(dot_u.size()));
00329                 return -1;
00330         }
00331         if(type != POSITION_ONLY && type != POSITION_VELOCITY && type != POSITION_VELOCITY_ACCELERATION) {
00332             error_message("invalid type %d\n", type);
00333             return -1;
00334         }
00335 
00336         // 1. update relative kinematics
00337         // 1.1 for revolute
00338         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_revolute_list.size(); i++) {
00339                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[m_body_revolute_list[i]];
00340                 mat33 T;
00341                 bodyTParentFromAxisAngle(body.m_Jac_JR, q(body.m_q_index), &T);
00342                 body.m_body_T_parent = T * body.m_body_T_parent_ref;
00343                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY) {
00344                     body.m_body_ang_vel_rel = body.m_Jac_JR * u(body.m_q_index);
00345                 }
00346                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY_ACCELERATION) {
00347                     body.m_body_ang_acc_rel = body.m_Jac_JR * dot_u(body.m_q_index);
00348                 }
00349         }
00350         // 1.2 for prismatic
00351         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_prismatic_list.size(); i++) {
00352                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[m_body_prismatic_list[i]];
00353                 body.m_parent_pos_parent_body =
00354                         body.m_parent_pos_parent_body_ref + body.m_parent_Jac_JT * q(body.m_q_index);
00355                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY) {
00356                     body.m_parent_vel_rel =
00357                         body.m_body_T_parent_ref.transpose() * body.m_Jac_JT * u(body.m_q_index);
00358                 }
00359                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY_ACCELERATION) {
00360                     body.m_parent_acc_rel = body.m_parent_Jac_JT * dot_u(body.m_q_index);
00361                 }
00362         }
00363         // 1.3 fixed joints: nothing to do
00364         // 1.4 6dof joints:
00365         for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_floating_list.size(); i++) {
00366                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[m_body_floating_list[i]];
00367 
00368                 body.m_body_T_parent = transformZ(q(body.m_q_index + 2)) *
00369                                                            transformY(q(body.m_q_index + 1)) * transformX(q(body.m_q_index));
00370                 body.m_parent_pos_parent_body(0) = q(body.m_q_index + 3);
00371                 body.m_parent_pos_parent_body(1) = q(body.m_q_index + 4);
00372                 body.m_parent_pos_parent_body(2) = q(body.m_q_index + 5);
00373                 body.m_parent_pos_parent_body = body.m_body_T_parent * body.m_parent_pos_parent_body;
00374 
00375                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY) {
00376                     body.m_body_ang_vel_rel(0) = u(body.m_q_index + 0);
00377                     body.m_body_ang_vel_rel(1) = u(body.m_q_index + 1);
00378                     body.m_body_ang_vel_rel(2) = u(body.m_q_index + 2);
00379 
00380                     body.m_parent_vel_rel(0) = u(body.m_q_index + 3);
00381                     body.m_parent_vel_rel(1) = u(body.m_q_index + 4);
00382                     body.m_parent_vel_rel(2) = u(body.m_q_index + 5);
00383 
00384                     body.m_parent_vel_rel = body.m_body_T_parent.transpose() * body.m_parent_vel_rel;
00385                 }
00386                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY_ACCELERATION) {
00387                     body.m_body_ang_acc_rel(0) = dot_u(body.m_q_index + 0);
00388                     body.m_body_ang_acc_rel(1) = dot_u(body.m_q_index + 1);
00389                     body.m_body_ang_acc_rel(2) = dot_u(body.m_q_index + 2);
00390 
00391                     body.m_parent_acc_rel(0) = dot_u(body.m_q_index + 3);
00392                     body.m_parent_acc_rel(1) = dot_u(body.m_q_index + 4);
00393                     body.m_parent_acc_rel(2) = dot_u(body.m_q_index + 5);
00394 
00395                     body.m_parent_acc_rel = body.m_body_T_parent.transpose() * body.m_parent_acc_rel;
00396                 }
00397         }
00398 
00399         // 2. absolute kinematic quantities (vector valued)
00400         // NOTE: this should be optimized by specializing for different body types
00401         // (e.g., relative rotation is always zero for prismatic joints, etc.)
00402 
00403         // calculations for root body
00404         {
00405                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[0];
00406                 // 3.1 update absolute positions and orientations:
00407                 // will be required if we add force elements (eg springs between bodies,
00408                 // or contacts)
00409                 // not required right now, added here for debugging purposes
00410                 body.m_body_pos = body.m_body_T_parent * body.m_parent_pos_parent_body;
00411                 body.m_body_T_world = body.m_body_T_parent;
00412 
00413                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY) {
00414                     // 3.2 update absolute velocities
00415                     body.m_body_ang_vel = body.m_body_ang_vel_rel;
00416                     body.m_body_vel = body.m_parent_vel_rel;
00417                 }
00418                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY_ACCELERATION) {
00419                     // 3.3 update absolute accelerations
00420                     // NOTE: assumption: dot(J_JR) = 0; true here, but not for general joints
00421                     body.m_body_ang_acc = body.m_body_ang_acc_rel;
00422                     body.m_body_acc = body.m_body_T_parent * body.m_parent_acc_rel;
00423                     // add gravitational acceleration to root body
00424                     // this is an efficient way to add gravitational terms,
00425                     // but it does mean that the kinematics are no longer
00426                     // correct at the acceleration level
00427                     // NOTE: To get correct acceleration kinematics, just set world_gravity to zero
00428                     body.m_body_acc = body.m_body_acc - body.m_body_T_parent * m_world_gravity;
00429                 }
00430         }
00431 
00432         for (idArrayIdx i = 1; i < m_body_list.size(); i++) {
00433                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[i];
00434                 RigidBody &parent = m_body_list[m_parent_index[i]];
00435                 // 2.1 update absolute positions and orientations:
00436                 // will be required if we add force elements (eg springs between bodies,
00437                 // or contacts)  not required right now added here for debugging purposes
00438                 body.m_body_pos =
00439                         body.m_body_T_parent * (parent.m_body_pos + body.m_parent_pos_parent_body);
00440                 body.m_body_T_world = body.m_body_T_parent * parent.m_body_T_world;
00441 
00442                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY) {
00443                     // 2.2 update absolute velocities
00444                     body.m_body_ang_vel =
00445                         body.m_body_T_parent * parent.m_body_ang_vel + body.m_body_ang_vel_rel;
00446 
00447                     body.m_body_vel =
00448                         body.m_body_T_parent *
00449                         (parent.m_body_vel + parent.m_body_ang_vel.cross(body.m_parent_pos_parent_body) +
00450                          body.m_parent_vel_rel);
00451                 }
00452                 if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY_ACCELERATION) {
00453                     // 2.3 update absolute accelerations
00454                     // NOTE: assumption: dot(J_JR) = 0; true here, but not for general joints
00455                     body.m_body_ang_acc =
00456                         body.m_body_T_parent * parent.m_body_ang_acc -
00457                         body.m_body_ang_vel_rel.cross(body.m_body_T_parent * parent.m_body_ang_vel) +
00458                         body.m_body_ang_acc_rel;
00459                     body.m_body_acc =
00460                         body.m_body_T_parent *
00461                         (parent.m_body_acc + parent.m_body_ang_acc.cross(body.m_parent_pos_parent_body) +
00462                          parent.m_body_ang_vel.cross(parent.m_body_ang_vel.cross(body.m_parent_pos_parent_body)) +
00463                          2.0 * parent.m_body_ang_vel.cross(body.m_parent_vel_rel) + body.m_parent_acc_rel);
00464                 }
00465         }
00466 
00467     return 0;
00468 }
00469 
00470 #if (defined BT_ID_HAVE_MAT3X) && (defined BT_ID_WITH_JACOBIANS)
00471 
00472 void MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::addRelativeJacobianComponent(RigidBody&body) {
00473     const int& idx=body.m_q_index;
00474     switch(body.m_joint_type) {
00475     case FIXED:
00476         break;
00477     case REVOLUTE:
00478         setMat3xElem(0,idx, body.m_Jac_JR(0), &body.m_body_Jac_R);
00479         setMat3xElem(1,idx, body.m_Jac_JR(1), &body.m_body_Jac_R);
00480         setMat3xElem(2,idx, body.m_Jac_JR(2), &body.m_body_Jac_R);
00481         break;
00482     case PRISMATIC:
00483         setMat3xElem(0,idx, body.m_body_T_parent_ref(0,0)*body.m_Jac_JT(0)
00484                      +body.m_body_T_parent_ref(1,0)*body.m_Jac_JT(1)
00485                      +body.m_body_T_parent_ref(2,0)*body.m_Jac_JT(2),
00486                      &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00487         setMat3xElem(1,idx,body.m_body_T_parent_ref(0,1)*body.m_Jac_JT(0)
00488                      +body.m_body_T_parent_ref(1,1)*body.m_Jac_JT(1)
00489                      +body.m_body_T_parent_ref(2,1)*body.m_Jac_JT(2),
00490                      &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00491         setMat3xElem(2,idx, body.m_body_T_parent_ref(0,2)*body.m_Jac_JT(0)
00492                      +body.m_body_T_parent_ref(1,2)*body.m_Jac_JT(1)
00493                      +body.m_body_T_parent_ref(2,2)*body.m_Jac_JT(2),
00494                      &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00495         break;
00496     case FLOATING:
00497         setMat3xElem(0,idx+0, 1.0, &body.m_body_Jac_R);
00498         setMat3xElem(1,idx+1, 1.0, &body.m_body_Jac_R);
00499         setMat3xElem(2,idx+2, 1.0, &body.m_body_Jac_R);
00500         // body_Jac_T = body_T_parent.transpose();
00501         setMat3xElem(0,idx+3, body.m_body_T_parent(0,0), &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00502         setMat3xElem(0,idx+4, body.m_body_T_parent(1,0), &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00503         setMat3xElem(0,idx+5, body.m_body_T_parent(2,0), &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00504 
00505         setMat3xElem(1,idx+3, body.m_body_T_parent(0,1), &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00506         setMat3xElem(1,idx+4, body.m_body_T_parent(1,1), &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00507         setMat3xElem(1,idx+5, body.m_body_T_parent(2,1), &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00508 
00509         setMat3xElem(2,idx+3, body.m_body_T_parent(0,2), &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00510         setMat3xElem(2,idx+4, body.m_body_T_parent(1,2), &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00511         setMat3xElem(2,idx+5, body.m_body_T_parent(2,2), &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00512 
00513         break;
00514     }
00515 }
00516 
00517 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::calculateJacobians(const vecx& q, const vecx& u, const KinUpdateType type) {
00518     if (q.size() != m_num_dofs || u.size() != m_num_dofs) {
00519         error_message("wrong vector dimension. system has %d DOFs,\n"
00520                       "but dim(q)= %d, dim(u)= %d\n",
00521                       m_num_dofs, static_cast<int>(q.size()), static_cast<int>(u.size()));
00522         return -1;
00523     }
00524     if(type != POSITION_ONLY && type != POSITION_VELOCITY) {
00525         error_message("invalid type %d\n", type);
00526         return -1;
00527     }
00528 
00529     addRelativeJacobianComponent(m_body_list[0]);
00530     for (idArrayIdx i = 1; i < m_body_list.size(); i++) {
00531         RigidBody &body = m_body_list[i];
00532         RigidBody &parent = m_body_list[m_parent_index[i]];
00533 
00534         mul(body.m_body_T_parent, parent.m_body_Jac_R,& body.m_body_Jac_R);
00535         body.m_body_Jac_T = parent.m_body_Jac_T;
00536         mul(tildeOperator(body.m_parent_pos_parent_body),parent.m_body_Jac_R,&m_m3x);
00537         sub(body.m_body_Jac_T,m_m3x, &body.m_body_Jac_T);
00538 
00539         addRelativeJacobianComponent(body);
00540         mul(body.m_body_T_parent, body.m_body_Jac_T,&body.m_body_Jac_T);
00541 
00542         if(type >= POSITION_VELOCITY) {
00543             body.m_body_dot_Jac_R_u = body.m_body_T_parent * parent.m_body_dot_Jac_R_u -
00544                 body.m_body_ang_vel_rel.cross(body.m_body_T_parent * parent.m_body_ang_vel);
00545             body.m_body_dot_Jac_T_u = body.m_body_T_parent *
00546                 (parent.m_body_dot_Jac_T_u + parent.m_body_dot_Jac_R_u.cross(body.m_parent_pos_parent_body) +
00547                  parent.m_body_ang_vel.cross(parent.m_body_ang_vel.cross(body.m_parent_pos_parent_body)) +
00548                  2.0 * parent.m_body_ang_vel.cross(body.m_parent_vel_rel));
00549         }
00550     }
00551     return 0;
00552 }
00553 #endif
00554 
00555 static inline void setSixDoFJacobians(const int dof, vec3 &Jac_JR, vec3 &Jac_JT) {
00556         switch (dof) {
00557                 // rotational part
00558                 case 0:
00559                         Jac_JR(0) = 1;
00560                         Jac_JR(1) = 0;
00561                         Jac_JR(2) = 0;
00562                         setZero(Jac_JT);
00563                         break;
00564                 case 1:
00565                         Jac_JR(0) = 0;
00566                         Jac_JR(1) = 1;
00567                         Jac_JR(2) = 0;
00568                         setZero(Jac_JT);
00569                         break;
00570                 case 2:
00571                         Jac_JR(0) = 0;
00572                         Jac_JR(1) = 0;
00573                         Jac_JR(2) = 1;
00574                         setZero(Jac_JT);
00575                         break;
00576                 // translational part
00577                 case 3:
00578                         setZero(Jac_JR);
00579                         Jac_JT(0) = 1;
00580                         Jac_JT(1) = 0;
00581                         Jac_JT(2) = 0;
00582                         break;
00583                 case 4:
00584                         setZero(Jac_JR);
00585                         Jac_JT(0) = 0;
00586                         Jac_JT(1) = 1;
00587                         Jac_JT(2) = 0;
00588                         break;
00589                 case 5:
00590                         setZero(Jac_JR);
00591                         Jac_JT(0) = 0;
00592                         Jac_JT(1) = 0;
00593                         Jac_JT(2) = 1;
00594                         break;
00595         }
00596 }
00597 
00598 static inline int jointNumDoFs(const JointType &type) {
00599         switch (type) {
00600                 case FIXED:
00601                         return 0;
00602                 case REVOLUTE:
00603                 case PRISMATIC:
00604                         return 1;
00605                 case FLOATING:
00606                         return 6;
00607         }
00608         // this should never happen
00609         error_message("invalid joint type\n");
00610         // TODO add configurable abort/crash function
00611         abort();
00612         return 0;
00613 }
00614 
00615 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::calculateMassMatrix(const vecx &q, const bool update_kinematics,
00616                                                                                                           const bool initialize_matrix,
00617                                                                                                           const bool set_lower_triangular_matrix,
00618                                                                                                           matxx *mass_matrix) {
00619 // This calculates the joint space mass matrix for the multibody system.
00620 // The algorithm is essentially an implementation of "method 3"
00621 // in "Efficient Dynamic Simulation of Robotic Mechanisms" (Walker and Orin, 1982)
00622 // (Later named "Composite Rigid Body Algorithm" by Featherstone).
00623 //
00624 // This implementation, however, handles branched systems and uses a formulation centered
00625 // on the origin of the body-fixed frame to avoid re-computing various quantities at the com.
00626 
00627         if (q.size() != m_num_dofs || mass_matrix->rows() != m_num_dofs ||
00628                 mass_matrix->cols() != m_num_dofs) {
00629                 error_message("Dimension error. System has %d DOFs,\n"
00630                                           "but dim(q)= %d, dim(mass_matrix)= %d x %d\n",
00631                                           m_num_dofs, static_cast<int>(q.size()), static_cast<int>(mass_matrix->rows()),
00632                                           static_cast<int>(mass_matrix->cols()));
00633                 return -1;
00634         }
00635 
00636         // TODO add optimized zeroing function?
00637         if (initialize_matrix) {
00638                 for (int i = 0; i < m_num_dofs; i++) {
00639                         for (int j = 0; j < m_num_dofs; j++) {
00640                             setMatxxElem(i, j, 0.0, mass_matrix);
00641                         }
00642                 }
00643         }
00644 
00645         if (update_kinematics) {
00646                 // 1. update relative kinematics
00647                 // 1.1 for revolute joints
00648                 for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_revolute_list.size(); i++) {
00649                         RigidBody &body = m_body_list[m_body_revolute_list[i]];
00650                         // from reference orientation (q=0) of body-fixed frame to current orientation
00651                         mat33 body_T_body_ref;
00652                         bodyTParentFromAxisAngle(body.m_Jac_JR, q(body.m_q_index), &body_T_body_ref);
00653                         body.m_body_T_parent = body_T_body_ref * body.m_body_T_parent_ref;
00654                 }
00655                 // 1.2 for prismatic joints
00656                 for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_prismatic_list.size(); i++) {
00657                         RigidBody &body = m_body_list[m_body_prismatic_list[i]];
00658                         // body.m_body_T_parent= fixed
00659                         body.m_parent_pos_parent_body =
00660                                 body.m_parent_pos_parent_body_ref + body.m_parent_Jac_JT * q(body.m_q_index);
00661                 }
00662                 // 1.3 fixed joints: nothing to do
00663                 // 1.4 6dof joints:
00664                 for (idArrayIdx i = 0; i < m_body_floating_list.size(); i++) {
00665                         RigidBody &body = m_body_list[m_body_floating_list[i]];
00666 
00667                         body.m_body_T_parent = transformZ(q(body.m_q_index + 2)) *
00668                                                                    transformY(q(body.m_q_index + 1)) *
00669                                                                    transformX(q(body.m_q_index));
00670                         body.m_parent_pos_parent_body(0) = q(body.m_q_index + 3);
00671                         body.m_parent_pos_parent_body(1) = q(body.m_q_index + 4);
00672                         body.m_parent_pos_parent_body(2) = q(body.m_q_index + 5);
00673 
00674                         body.m_parent_pos_parent_body = body.m_body_T_parent * body.m_parent_pos_parent_body;
00675                 }
00676         }
00677         for (int i = m_body_list.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00678                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[i];
00679                 // calculate mass, center of mass and inertia of "composite rigid body",
00680                 // ie, sub-tree starting at current body
00681                 body.m_subtree_mass = body.m_mass;
00682                 body.m_body_subtree_mass_com = body.m_body_mass_com;
00683                 body.m_body_subtree_I_body = body.m_body_I_body;
00684 
00685                 for (idArrayIdx c = 0; c < m_child_indices[i].size(); c++) {
00686                         RigidBody &child = m_body_list[m_child_indices[i][c]];
00687                         mat33 body_T_child = child.m_body_T_parent.transpose();
00688 
00689                         body.m_subtree_mass += child.m_subtree_mass;
00690                         body.m_body_subtree_mass_com += body_T_child * child.m_body_subtree_mass_com +
00691                                                                                         child.m_parent_pos_parent_body * child.m_subtree_mass;
00692                         body.m_body_subtree_I_body +=
00693                                 body_T_child * child.m_body_subtree_I_body * child.m_body_T_parent;
00694 
00695                         if (child.m_subtree_mass > 0) {
00696                                 // Shift the reference point for the child subtree inertia using the
00697                                 // Huygens-Steiner ("parallel axis") theorem.
00698                                 // (First shift from child origin to child com, then from there to this body's
00699                                 // origin)
00700                                 vec3 r_com = body_T_child * child.m_body_subtree_mass_com / child.m_subtree_mass;
00701                                 mat33 tilde_r_child_com = tildeOperator(r_com);
00702                                 mat33 tilde_r_body_com = tildeOperator(child.m_parent_pos_parent_body + r_com);
00703                                 body.m_body_subtree_I_body +=
00704                                         child.m_subtree_mass *
00705                                         (tilde_r_child_com * tilde_r_child_com - tilde_r_body_com * tilde_r_body_com);
00706                         }
00707                 }
00708         }
00709 
00710         for (int i = m_body_list.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00711                 const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[i];
00712 
00713                 // determine DoF-range for body
00714                 const int q_index_min = body.m_q_index;
00715                 const int q_index_max = q_index_min + jointNumDoFs(body.m_joint_type) - 1;
00716                 // loop over the DoFs used by this body
00717                 // local joint jacobians (ok as is for 1-DoF joints)
00718                 vec3 Jac_JR = body.m_Jac_JR;
00719                 vec3 Jac_JT = body.m_Jac_JT;
00720                 for (int col = q_index_max; col >= q_index_min; col--) {
00721                         // set jacobians for 6-DoF joints
00722                         if (FLOATING == body.m_joint_type) {
00723                                 setSixDoFJacobians(col - q_index_min, Jac_JR, Jac_JT);
00724                         }
00725 
00726                         vec3 body_eom_rot =
00727                                 body.m_body_subtree_I_body * Jac_JR + body.m_body_subtree_mass_com.cross(Jac_JT);
00728                         vec3 body_eom_trans =
00729                                 body.m_subtree_mass * Jac_JT - body.m_body_subtree_mass_com.cross(Jac_JR);
00730                         setMatxxElem(col, col, Jac_JR.dot(body_eom_rot) + Jac_JT.dot(body_eom_trans), mass_matrix);
00731 
00732                         // rest of the mass matrix column upwards
00733                         {
00734                                 // 1. for multi-dof joints, rest of the dofs of this body
00735                                 for (int row = col - 1; row >= q_index_min; row--) {
00736                                         if (FLOATING != body.m_joint_type) {
00737                                                 error_message("??\n");
00738                                                 return -1;
00739                                         }
00740                                         setSixDoFJacobians(row - q_index_min, Jac_JR, Jac_JT);
00741                                         const double Mrc = Jac_JR.dot(body_eom_rot) + Jac_JT.dot(body_eom_trans);
00742                                         setMatxxElem(col, row, Mrc, mass_matrix);
00743                                 }
00744                                 // 2. ancestor dofs
00745                                 int child_idx = i;
00746                                 int parent_idx = m_parent_index[i];
00747                                 while (parent_idx >= 0) {
00748                                         const RigidBody &child_body = m_body_list[child_idx];
00749                                         const RigidBody &parent_body = m_body_list[parent_idx];
00750 
00751                                         const mat33 parent_T_child = child_body.m_body_T_parent.transpose();
00752                                         body_eom_rot = parent_T_child * body_eom_rot;
00753                                         body_eom_trans = parent_T_child * body_eom_trans;
00754                                         body_eom_rot += child_body.m_parent_pos_parent_body.cross(body_eom_trans);
00755 
00756                                         const int parent_body_q_index_min = parent_body.m_q_index;
00757                                         const int parent_body_q_index_max =
00758                                                 parent_body_q_index_min + jointNumDoFs(parent_body.m_joint_type) - 1;
00759                                         vec3 Jac_JR = parent_body.m_Jac_JR;
00760                                         vec3 Jac_JT = parent_body.m_Jac_JT;
00761                                         for (int row = parent_body_q_index_max; row >= parent_body_q_index_min; row--) {
00762                                                 // set jacobians for 6-DoF joints
00763                                                 if (FLOATING == parent_body.m_joint_type) {
00764                                                         setSixDoFJacobians(row - parent_body_q_index_min, Jac_JR, Jac_JT);
00765                                                 }
00766                                                 const double Mrc = Jac_JR.dot(body_eom_rot) + Jac_JT.dot(body_eom_trans);
00767                                                 setMatxxElem(col, row, Mrc, mass_matrix);
00768                                         }
00769 
00770                                         child_idx = parent_idx;
00771                                         parent_idx = m_parent_index[child_idx];
00772                                 }
00773                         }
00774                 }
00775         }
00776 
00777         if (set_lower_triangular_matrix) {
00778                 for (int col = 0; col < m_num_dofs; col++) {
00779                         for (int row = 0; row < col; row++) {
00780                             setMatxxElem(row, col, (*mass_matrix)(col, row), mass_matrix);
00781                         }
00782                 }
00783         }
00784         return 0;
00785 }
00786 
00787 // utility macro
00788 #define CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(index)                                                                                                             \
00789         do {                                                                                                                                                                               \
00790                 if (index < 0 || index >= m_num_bodies) {                                                                                                 \
00791                         error_message("invalid index %d (num_bodies= %d)\n", index, m_num_bodies);                       \
00792                         return -1;                                                                                                                                                       \
00793                 }                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00794         } while (0)
00795 
00796 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getParentIndex(const int body_index, int *p) {
00797         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00798         *p = m_parent_index[body_index];
00799         return 0;
00800 }
00801 
00802 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getUserInt(const int body_index, int *user_int) const {
00803         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00804         *user_int = m_user_int[body_index];
00805         return 0;
00806 }
00807 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getUserPtr(const int body_index, void **user_ptr) const {
00808         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00809         *user_ptr = m_user_ptr[body_index];
00810         return 0;
00811 }
00812 
00813 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::setUserInt(const int body_index, const int user_int) {
00814         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00815         m_user_int[body_index] = user_int;
00816         return 0;
00817 }
00818 
00819 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::setUserPtr(const int body_index, void *const user_ptr) {
00820         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00821         m_user_ptr[body_index] = user_ptr;
00822         return 0;
00823 }
00824 
00825 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyOrigin(int body_index, vec3 *world_origin) const {
00826         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00827         const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
00828         *world_origin = body.m_body_T_world.transpose() * body.m_body_pos;
00829         return 0;
00830 }
00831 
00832 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyCoM(int body_index, vec3 *world_com) const {
00833         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00834         const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
00835         if (body.m_mass > 0) {
00836                 *world_com = body.m_body_T_world.transpose() *
00837                                          (body.m_body_pos + body.m_body_mass_com / body.m_mass);
00838         } else {
00839                 *world_com = body.m_body_T_world.transpose() * (body.m_body_pos);
00840         }
00841         return 0;
00842 }
00843 
00844 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyTransform(int body_index, mat33 *world_T_body) const {
00845         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00846         const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
00847         *world_T_body = body.m_body_T_world.transpose();
00848         return 0;
00849 }
00850 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyAngularVelocity(int body_index, vec3 *world_omega) const {
00851         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00852         const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
00853         *world_omega = body.m_body_T_world.transpose() * body.m_body_ang_vel;
00854         return 0;
00855 }
00856 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyLinearVelocity(int body_index,
00857                                                                                                                 vec3 *world_velocity) const {
00858         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00859         const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
00860         *world_velocity = body.m_body_T_world.transpose() * body.m_body_vel;
00861         return 0;
00862 }
00863 
00864 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyLinearVelocityCoM(int body_index,
00865                                                                                                                    vec3 *world_velocity) const {
00866         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00867         const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
00868         vec3 com;
00869         if (body.m_mass > 0) {
00870                 com = body.m_body_mass_com / body.m_mass;
00871         } else {
00872                 com(0) = 0;
00873                 com(1) = 0;
00874                 com(2) = 0;
00875         }
00876 
00877         *world_velocity =
00878                 body.m_body_T_world.transpose() * (body.m_body_vel + body.m_body_ang_vel.cross(com));
00879         return 0;
00880 }
00881 
00882 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyAngularAcceleration(int body_index,
00883                                                                                                                          vec3 *world_dot_omega) const {
00884         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00885         const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
00886         *world_dot_omega = body.m_body_T_world.transpose() * body.m_body_ang_acc;
00887         return 0;
00888 }
00889 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyLinearAcceleration(int body_index,
00890                                                                                                                         vec3 *world_acceleration) const {
00891         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00892         const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
00893         *world_acceleration = body.m_body_T_world.transpose() * body.m_body_acc;
00894         return 0;
00895 }

00921 
00922 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyAxisOfMotion(const int body_index, vec3* axis)  const{
00923     CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00924     if(m_body_list[body_index].m_joint_type == REVOLUTE) {
00925         *axis = m_body_list[body_index].m_Jac_JR;
00926         return 0;
00927     }
00928     if(m_body_list[body_index].m_joint_type == PRISMATIC) {
00929         *axis = m_body_list[body_index].m_Jac_JT;
00930         return 0;
00931     }
00932     setZero(*axis);
00933     return 0;
00934 }

00939         return 0;

00978 void MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::clearAllUserForcesAndMoments() {
00979         for (int index = 0; index < m_num_bodies; index++) {
00980                 RigidBody &body = m_body_list[index];
00981                 setZero(body.m_body_force_user);
00982                 setZero(body.m_body_moment_user);
00983         }
00984 }
00985

00987         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00988         m_body_list[body_index].m_body_force_user += body_force;
00989         return 0;
00990 }

00992 int MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::addUserMoment(const int body_index, const vec3 &body_moment) {
00993         CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
00994         m_body_list[body_index].m_body_moment_user += body_moment;
00995         return 0;
00996 }

00998 #if (defined BT_ID_HAVE_MAT3X) && (defined BT_ID_WITH_JACOBIANS)
00999 int  MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyDotJacobianTransU(const int body_index, vec3* world_dot_jac_trans_u) const {
01000     CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
01001     const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
01002     *world_dot_jac_trans_u = body.m_body_T_world.transpose() * body.m_body_dot_Jac_T_u;
01003     return 0;
01004 }
01005 
01006 int  MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyDotJacobianRotU(const int body_index, vec3* world_dot_jac_rot_u) const{
01007      CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
01008     const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
01009     *world_dot_jac_rot_u = body.m_body_T_world.transpose() * body.m_body_dot_Jac_R_u;
01010     return 0;
01011 }
01012 
01013 int  MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyJacobianTrans(const int body_index, mat3x* world_jac_trans) const{
01014     CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
01015     const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
01016     mul(body.m_body_T_world.transpose(), body.m_body_Jac_T, world_jac_trans);
01017     return 0;
01018 }
01019 
01020 int  MultiBodyTree::MultiBodyImpl::getBodyJacobianRot(const int body_index, mat3x* world_jac_rot) const{
01021     CHECK_IF_BODY_INDEX_IS_VALID(body_index);
01022     const RigidBody &body = m_body_list[body_index];
01023     mul(body.m_body_T_world.transpose(), body.m_body_Jac_R,world_jac_rot);
01024     return 0;
01025 }
